sqlMap.select: /* HkCultureResveDAO.viewFclty */ SELECT A.FCLTY_SN, A.RESVE_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM061',A.RESVE_SE) AS RESVE_SE_NM, A.AREA_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',A.AREA_SE) AS AREA_SE_NM, A.LC_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',A.LC_SE) AS LC_SE_NM, FN_CMMNCODE_NM_EN('COM172',A.LC_SE) AS LC_SE_NM_EN, A.FCLTY_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',A.FCLTY_SE) AS FCLTY_SE_NM, A.SPCE_NM, A.SPCE_NM_EN, A.RESVE_POSBL_AT, A.USE_AT, A.AR, A.NMPR, A.PRPOS, A.PRPOS_EN, A.EQPMN_USE_AT, A.RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.WKEND_RESVE_POLSBL_AT, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.DELETE_AT, A.OPEN_AT, (SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(EQPMN_SN)) FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_EQPMN AA WHERE AA.FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn#) AS EQPMN_SNS, (SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(EQPMN_NM)) FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_EQPMN AA, TN_CULT_EQPMN BB WHERE AA.EQPMN_SN = BB.EQPMN_SN AND AA.FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn# AND BB.USE_AT = 'Y' AND BB.DELETE_AT = 'N') AS EQPMN_NMS FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY A WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn#

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listFcltyForLayout */ SELECT A.FCLTY_SN, A.AREA_SE, A.LC_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',A.LC_SE) AS LC_SE_NM, A.FCLTY_SE, A.SPCE_NM, A.SPCE_NM_EN, A.PRPOS, A.PRPOS_EN, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.ATCH_FILE_ID
,NVL(B.NOT_USE_CNT,0) AS NOT_USE_CNT
FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY A
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT FCLTY_SN, SUM( CASE WHEN TRUNC(RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(RESVE_END_TIME+1) <= SYSDATE AND USE_AT = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(USE_AT, 'N',1,0) END ) AS NOT_USE_CNT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND (RESVE_DT - 90) <= SYSDATE AND (RESVE_DT + 30) >= SYSDATE AND USER_SN = #userSn# AND RESVE_STTUS = '02' GROUP BY FCLTY_SN ) B ON B.FCLTY_SN = A.FCLTY_SN
WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_POSBL_AT = 'Y' AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SPCE_NM ASC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(FCLTY_SN),0) + 1 AS FCLTY_SN FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY
/* HkCultureResveDAO.insertFclty */ INSERT INTO TN_CULT_FCLTY ( FCLTY_SN, RESVE_SE, AREA_SE, LC_SE, FCLTY_SE, SPCE_NM, SPCE_NM_EN, RESVE_POSBL_AT, USE_AT, AR, NMPR, PRPOS, PRPOS_EN, EQPMN_USE_AT, RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN, ATCH_FILE_ID, WKEND_RESVE_POLSBL_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DELETE_AT, OPEN_AT ) VALUES ( #fcltySn#, #resveSe#, #areaSe#, #lcSe#, #fcltySe#, #spceNm#, #spceNmEn#, #resvePosblAt#, #useAt#, #ar#, #nmpr#, #prpos#, #prposEn#, #eqpmnUseAt#, #resveImprtyResn#, #atchFileId#, #wkendResvePolsblAt#, SYSDATE, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE, #lastUpdusrId#, 'N', #openAt# )
/* HkCultureResveDAO.insertFcltyEqpmn */ INSERT INTO TN_CULT_FCLTY_EQPMN ( FCLTY_SN, EQPMN_SN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID ) VALUES ( #fcltySn#, #eqpmnSn#, SYSDATE, #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: /* HkCultureResveDAO.updateFclty */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY SET RESVE_SE = #resveSe#, AREA_SE = #areaSe#, LC_SE = #lcSe#, FCLTY_SE = #fcltySe#, SPCE_NM = #spceNm#, SPCE_NM_EN = #spceNmEn#, RESVE_POSBL_AT = #resvePosblAt#, USE_AT = #useAt#, AR = #ar#, NMPR = #nmpr#, PRPOS = #prpos#, PRPOS_EN = #prposEn#, EQPMN_USE_AT = #eqpmnUseAt#, RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN = #resveImprtyResn#, ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#, WKEND_RESVE_POLSBL_AT = #wkendResvePolsblAt#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, OPEN_AT = #openAt# WHERE FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.deleteFclty */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn#

sql.isNotEqual: AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND RESVE_SE IN ('O','A') AND OPEN_AT = 'Y'

sqlMap.select:
/* HkCultureResveDAO.listEqpmnPopup */ SELECT A.EQPMN_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_NM_EN, A.EQPMN_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM147',A.EQPMN_SE) AS EQPMN_SE_NM, A.RESVE_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM061',A.RESVE_SE) AS RESVE_SE_NM, A.RESVE_POSBL_AT, A.RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN, A.USE_AT, A.DTLS_INFO, A.DTLS_INFO_EN, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.DELETE_AT, A.OPEN_AT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL WHERE EQPMN_SN = A.EQPMN_SN AND DELETE_AT = '0' ) AS EQPMN_QY FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN A WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
ORDER BY A.EQPMN_NM ASC
/* HkCultureResveDAO.listEqpmnNm */ SELECT A.EQPMN_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_NM_EN FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN A WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY A.EQPMN_NM ASC

/* HkCultureResveDAO.viewEqpmn */ SELECT A.EQPMN_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_NM_EN, A.EQPMN_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM147',A.EQPMN_SE) AS EQPMN_SE_NM, A.RESVE_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM061',A.RESVE_SE) AS RESVE_SE_NM, A.RESVE_POSBL_AT, A.RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN, A.USE_AT, A.DTLS_INFO, A.DTLS_INFO_EN, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL WHERE EQPMN_SN = A.EQPMN_SN AND DELETE_AT = '0' ) AS EQPMN_QY, A.DELETE_AT, A.OPEN_AT FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN A WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(EQPMN_SN),0) + 1 AS EQPMN_SN FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN
/* HkCultureResveDAO.insertEqpmn */ INSERT INTO TN_CULT_EQPMN ( EQPMN_SN, EQPMN_NM, EQPMN_NM_EN, RESVE_SE, RESVE_POSBL_AT, RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN, USE_AT, DTLS_INFO, DTLS_INFO_EN, ATCH_FILE_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DELETE_AT, EQPMN_SE, OPEN_AT ) VALUES ( #eqpmnSn#, #eqpmnNm#, #eqpmnNmEn#, #resveSe#, #resvePosblAt#, #resveImprtyResn#, #useAt#, #dtlsInfo#, #dtlsInfoEn#, #atchFileId#, SYSDATE, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE, #lastUpdusrId#, 'N', #eqpmnSe#, #openAt# )
sqlMap.update: /* HkCultureResveDAO.updateEqpmn */ UPDATE TN_CULT_EQPMN SET EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn#, EQPMN_NM = #eqpmnNm#, EQPMN_NM_EN = #eqpmnNmEn#, RESVE_SE = #resveSe#, RESVE_POSBL_AT = #resvePosblAt#, RESVE_IMPRTY_RESN = #resveImprtyResn#, USE_AT = #useAt#, DTLS_INFO = #dtlsInfo#, DTLS_INFO_EN = #dtlsInfoEn#, ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, EQPMN_SE = #eqpmnSe#, OPEN_AT = #openAt# WHERE EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.deleteEqpmn */ UPDATE TN_CULT_EQPMN SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn#
sqlMap.insert: /* HkCultureResveDAO.insertEqpmnDetail */ INSERT INTO TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL ( EQPMN_DETAIL_SN, EQPMN_SN, EQPMN_DETAIL_NM, USE_AT, RM, DELETE_AT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(EQPMN_DETAIL_SN),0) + 1 AS EQPMN_DETAIL_SN FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL), #eqpmnSn#, #eqpmnDetailNm#, #useAt#, #rm#, '0' )
sqlMap.update: /* HkCultureResveDAO.updateEqpmnDetail */ UPDATE TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL SET EQPMN_DETAIL_NM = #eqpmnDetailNm#, USE_AT = #useAt#, RM = #rm# WHERE EQPMN_DETAIL_SN = #eqpmnDetailSn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.deleteEqpmnDetail */ UPDATE TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL SET DELETE_AT = '1' WHERE EQPMN_DETAIL_SN = #eqpmnDetailSn#
sqlMap.select: /* HkCultureResveDAO.listEqpmnDetail */ SELECT A.EQPMN_SN, A.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN, A.EQPMN_DETAIL_NM, A.USE_AT, A.RM FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL A WHERE A.EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn# AND A.DELETE_AT = '0' ORDER BY A.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN ASC
sqlMap.update: /* HkCultureResveDAO.deleteEqpmnDetailByEqpmnSn */ UPDATE TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL A SET DELETE_AT = '1' WHERE EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn#

sql.isNotEmpty: RESVE_SN IN ( SELECT AA.RESVE_SN FROM TN_CULT_RESVE_EQPMN AA, TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL BB WHERE BB.EQPMN_SN = #eqpmnSn# AND AA.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN = BB.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN )
CASE WHEN TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(A.RESVE_END_TIME+1) <= SYSDATE AND A.USE_AT = 'W' THEN 'N' ELSE A.USE_AT END = #useAt#

sqlMap.select: /* HkCultureResveDAO.listDalyResveSttus */ SELECT B.FCLTY_SN, A.RESVE_SN, TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESVE_DT, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.AREA_SE) AS AREA_SE_NM, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.LC_SE) AS LC_SE_NM, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.FCLTY_SE) AS FCLTY_SE_NM, B.SPCE_NM, A.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, A.RESVE_END_TIME, A.RESVE_END_TIME - A.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME AS TIME_CNT , A.RESVE_NM, A.USE_NMPR || '명' as USE_NMPR, A.USE_PURPOSE_CN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TN_CULT_RESVE_EQPMN WHERE RESVE_SN = A.RESVE_SN) AS EQPMN_CNT, A.NTSS_AT, 0 AS SCHDUL_CNT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY B LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A ON A.FCLTY_SN = B.FCLTY_SN AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_STTUS = '02' AND TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #resveDt# WHERE B.DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY B.AREA_SE, B.LC_SE,B.FCLTY_SE, B.SPCE_NM
/* HkCultureResveDAO.listResveSttusCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A, TN_CULT_FCLTY B WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.FCLTY_SN = B.FCLTY_SN(+)

/* HkCultureResveDAO.viewResveSttus */ SELECT FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM061',B.RESVE_SE) AS RESVE_SE_NM, B.AREA_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.AREA_SE) AS AREA_SE_NM, B.LC_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.LC_SE) AS LC_SE_NM, B.FCLTY_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.FCLTY_SE) AS FCLTY_SE_NM, B.SPCE_NM, B.SPCE_NM_EN, A.FCLTY_SN, A.RESVE_SN, A.USER_SN, A.RESVE_NM, crypto.dec('normal', A.MBTLNUM) as MBTLNUM, crypto.dec('normal', A.EMAIL) as EMAIL, A.AGE_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM081',A.AGE_SE) AS AGE_SE_NM, A.JOB_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM056',A.JOB_SE) AS JOB_SE_NM, A.RESDNC_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM063',A.RESDNC_SE) AS RESDNC_SE_NM, A.USE_NMPR, A.USE_PURPOSE_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM173',A.USE_PURPOSE_SE) AS USE_PURPOSE_SE_NM, A.USE_PURPOSE_CN, A.RESVE_RECPTN_SE, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM146',A.RESVE_RECPTN_SE) AS RESVE_RECPTN_SE_NM, TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESVE_DT, A.RESVE_STTUS, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM071',A.RESVE_STTUS) AS RESVE_STTUS_NM, CASE WHEN TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(A.RESVE_END_TIME+1) <= SYSDATE AND A.USE_AT = 'W' THEN 'N' ELSE A.USE_AT END AS USE_AT, CASE WHEN TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(A.RESVE_END_TIME+1) <= SYSDATE AND A.USE_AT = 'W' THEN FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM073','N') ELSE FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM073',A.USE_AT) END AS USE_AT_NM, A.RESVE_NO, A.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, A.RESVE_END_TIME, A.NTSS_AT, TO_CHAR(A.NTSS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS NTSS_DT, A.RE_NTSS_AT, TO_CHAR(A.RE_NTSS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RE_NTSS_DT, A.KOSK_IP, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') || substr(to_char(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM),18,7) AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.DELETE_AT, A.ADM_CMMNT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A, TN_CULT_FCLTY B WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.FCLTY_SN = B.FCLTY_SN(+) AND A.RESVE_SN = #resveSn#
A.USER_SN = #userSn#

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A WHERE A.USER_SN = #userSn# AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_STTUS !='02'
AND TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT) = TRUNC(TO_DATE(#resveDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN TRUNC(RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(RESVE_END_TIME+1) <= SYSDATE AND USE_AT = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(USE_AT, 'N',1,0) END),0) AS CNT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND (RESVE_DT - 90) <= SYSDATE AND (RESVE_DT + 30) >= SYSDATE AND USER_SN = #userSn# AND RESVE_STTUS = '02'

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listEqpmnByResve */ SELECT C.RESVE_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_SN, COUNT(B.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN) AS EQPMN_QY, TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(B.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN)) AS EQPMN_DETAIL_SN_LIST FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN A, TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL B, TN_CULT_RESVE_EQPMN C WHERE A.EQPMN_SN = B.EQPMN_SN AND B.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN = C.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN AND C.RESVE_SN = #resveSn# AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_POSBL_AT = 'Y' GROUP BY C.RESVE_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_SN ORDER BY A.EQPMN_NM ASC

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listEqpmnByDt */ SELECT C.RESVE_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_SN, COUNT(B.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN) AS EQPMN_QY, TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(B.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN)) AS EQPMN_DETAIL_SN_LIST FROM TN_CULT_EQPMN A, TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL B, TN_CULT_RESVE_EQPMN C, TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE D WHERE A.EQPMN_SN = B.EQPMN_SN AND B.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN = C.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN AND C.RESVE_SN = D.RESVE_SN AND TO_CHAR(D.RESVE_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') = #resveDt# AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_POSBL_AT = 'Y' AND D.RESVE_STTUS IN ('01','02','03') AND ( D.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME BETWEEN #beginTime# AND #endTime# OR D.RESVE_END_TIME BETWEEN #beginTime# AND #endTime# OR (D.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME <= #beginTime# AND D.RESVE_END_TIME >= #endTime#) ) GROUP BY C.RESVE_SN, A.EQPMN_NM, A.EQPMN_SN ORDER BY A.EQPMN_NM ASC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(RESVE_SN),0) + 1 AS RESVE_SN FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE
/* HkCultureResveDAO.insertResve */ INSERT INTO TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE ( FCLTY_SN, RESVE_SN, USER_SN, RESVE_NM, MBTLNUM, EMAIL, AGE_SE, JOB_SE, RESDNC_SE, USE_NMPR, USE_PURPOSE_CN, RESVE_RECPTN_SE, RESVE_DT, RESVE_STTUS, USE_AT, RESVE_NO, RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, RESVE_END_TIME, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DELETE_AT, USE_PURPOSE_SE ) VALUES ( #fcltySn#, #resveSn#, #userSn#, #resveNm#, crypto.enc('normal', #mbtlnum#), crypto.enc('normal', #email#), #ageSe#, #jobSe#, #resdncSe#, #useNmpr#, #usePurposeCn#, #resveRecptnSe#, TO_DATE(#resveDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD'), DECODE('bos',#siteName#,'02',#resveSttus#), 'W', #resveNo#, #resveBeginTime#, #resveEndTime#, current_timestamp, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE, #lastUpdusrId#, 'N', #usePurposeSe# )
sqlMap.update: /* HkCultureResveDAO.updateResve */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE SET FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn#, USER_SN = #userSn#, RESVE_NM = #resveNm#, MBTLNUM = crypto.enc('normal', #mbtlnum#), EMAIL = crypto.enc('normal', #email#), AGE_SE = #ageSe#, JOB_SE = #jobSe#, RESDNC_SE = #resdncSe#, USE_NMPR = #useNmpr#, USE_PURPOSE_CN = #usePurposeCn#, RESVE_RECPTN_SE = #resveRecptnSe#, RESVE_DT = TO_DATE(#resveDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD'), RESVE_STTUS = #resveSttus#, RESVE_BEGIN_TIME = #resveBeginTime#, RESVE_END_TIME = #resveEndTime#, USE_PURPOSE_SE = #usePurposeSe#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE RESVE_SN = #resveSn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.updateResveCmmnt */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE SET ADM_CMMNT = #admCmmnt# WHERE RESVE_SN = #resveSn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.deleteResveSttus */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE RESVE_SN = #resveSn#

/* HkCultureResveDAO.updateResveSttus */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE SET RESVE_STTUS = #resveSttus#, RESVE_STTUS_DT = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE RESVE_SN = #resveSn#
USER_SN = #userSn#
sqlMap.select: /* HkCultureResveDAO.listResveByCal */ SELECT A.FCLTY_SN, A.RESVE_SN, A.USER_SN, A.RESVE_NM, A.MBTLNUM, A.EMAIL, A.AGE_SE, TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESVE_DT, A.RESVE_STTUS, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM071',A.RESVE_STTUS) AS RESVE_STTUS_NM, A.USE_AT, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM073',A.USE_AT) AS USE_AT_NM, A.RESVE_NO, A.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, A.RESVE_END_TIME, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.DELETE_AT FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND TRUNC(RESVE_DT) = TO_DATE(#resveDt#,'YYYYMMDD') AND A.FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn# AND A.RESVE_STTUS NOT IN ('04','05') ORDER BY A.RESVE_DT ASC

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listStatsEqpmn */ SELECT NVL(B.EQPMN_NM,'총계') AS EQPMN_NM, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'01',1,0)) AS STTUS01, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'02',1,0)) AS STTUS02, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'04',1,0)) AS STTUS04, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'03',1,0)) AS STTUS03, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'05',1,0)) AS STTUS05, COUNT(*) AS STTUSALL, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'01',DECODE(A.USE_AT,'Y',1,0),0)) AS USE_YES, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'01',CASE WHEN TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(A.RESVE_END_TIME+1) > SYSDATE AND A.USE_AT = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,0)) AS USE_WAIT, SUM(DECODE(A.RESVE_STTUS,'01',CASE WHEN TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT)+ (1/24)*(A.RESVE_END_TIME+1) <= SYSDATE AND A.USE_AT = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,0)) AS USE_NO, COUNT(*) AS STTUSALL2 FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A, TN_CULT_EQPMN B, TN_CULT_EQPMN_DETAIL C, TN_CULT_RESVE_EQPMN D WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_SN = D.RESVE_SN(+) AND B.EQPMN_SN = C.EQPMN_SN AND C.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN = D.EQPMN_DETAIL_SN AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((B.EQPMN_SN, B.EQPMN_NM),()) ORDER BY B.EQPMN_NM

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listStatsVisit */ SELECT NVL(A.VISIT_IP,'총계') AS VISIT_IP, COUNT(A.VISIT_SN) AS VISIT_COUNT
FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_HISTORY A WHERE 1=1
TRUNC(A.VISIT_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#resveSdate#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#resveEdate#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((A.VISIT_IP),())

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listStatsOriData */
SELECT RESVE_YYYYMM, RESVE_MMDD, FCLTY_SE_NM, USE_PURPOSE_SE_NM, SPCE_NM, RESVE_NM, USE_NMPR, RESVE_TIME, USE_PURPOSE_CN FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT, 'yy') || '년 ' || TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT, 'MM') || '월' AS RESVE_YYYYMM, TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT, 'MM/DD') || '(' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT,'DAY'),1,1) || ')' AS RESVE_MMDD, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.FCLTY_SE) AS FCLTY_SE_NM, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM173',A.USE_PURPOSE_SE) AS USE_PURPOSE_SE_NM, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.AREA_SE) || '>' || FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.LC_SE) || '>' || FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',B.FCLTY_SE) || '>' || B.SPCE_NM AS SPCE_NM, A.RESVE_NM, A.USE_NMPR, LPAD(A.RESVE_BEGIN_TIME,2,'0') || ':00 ~' || LPAD(A.RESVE_END_TIME,2,'0') || ':59' AS RESVE_TIME, A.USE_PURPOSE_CN FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A, TN_CULT_FCLTY B WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.FCLTY_SN = B.FCLTY_SN AND A.RESVE_STTUS = '02'
TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #resveSdate# AND #resveEdate#
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(B.VISIT_DT, 'yy') || '년 ' || TO_CHAR(B.VISIT_DT, 'MM') || '월' AS RESVE_YYYYMM, TO_CHAR(B.VISIT_DT, 'MM/DD') || '(' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(B.VISIT_DT,'DAY'),1,1) || ')' AS RESVE_MMDD, '열린공간' AS FCLTY_SE_NM, '열린공간' AS USE_PURPOSE_SE_NM, '열린공간(' || B.VISIT_IP || ')' AS SPCE_NM, '열린공간' AS RESVE_NM, SUM(1) AS USE_NMPR, '09:00 ~ 21:59' AS RESVE_TIME, '열린공간' AS USE_PURPOSE_CN FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_HISTORY B WHERE 1=1
TO_CHAR(B.VISIT_DT,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #resveSdate# AND #resveEdate#
GROUP BY B.VISIT_DT, B.VISIT_IP ) TB ORDER BY TB.RESVE_YYYYMM ASC, TB.RESVE_MMDD ASC, TB.SPCE_NM ASC

/* HkCultureResveDAO.listStatsUsePurpsByMonth */ SELECT TO_CHAR(RESVE_YYYYMM, 'yy') || '년 ' || TO_CHAR(RESVE_YYYYMM, 'MM') || '월' AS RESVE_YYYYMM, PURPS01, PURPS02, PURPS03, PURPS04, PURPS05, PURPSALL FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT,'MM') AS RESVE_YYYYMM, NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.USE_PURPOSE_SE,'01',A.USE_NMPR,0)),0) AS PURPS01, NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.USE_PURPOSE_SE,'02',A.USE_NMPR,0)),0) AS PURPS02, NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.USE_PURPOSE_SE,'04',A.USE_NMPR,0)),0) AS PURPS04, NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.USE_PURPOSE_SE,'03',A.USE_NMPR,0)),0) AS PURPS03, NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.USE_PURPOSE_SE,'05',A.USE_NMPR,0)),0) AS PURPS05, NVL(SUM(A.USE_NMPR),0) AS PURPSALL
FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE A WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.RESVE_STTUS = '02'
TO_CHAR(A.RESVE_DT,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #resveSdate# AND #resveEdate#
GROUP BY TRUNC(A.RESVE_DT,'MM') ORDER BY RESVE_YYYYMM ASC ) TB

SELECT NVL(A.LC_SE,'0000') AS LC_SE, NVL(A.FCLTY_SN,0) AS FCLTY_SN, FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM172',LC_SE) || DECODE(SPCE_NM,NULL,DECODE(LC_SE,NULL,'',' > '),' > ') || DECODE(FCLTY_SN,NULL,DECODE(LC_SE,NULL,'총합계','전체'),SPCE_NM) AS SPCE_NM FROM TN_CULT_FCLTY A WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((A.LC_SE, A.FCLTY_SN, A.SPCE_NM),(A.LC_SE),())

/* HkCultureResveDAO.viewSchdul */ SELECT A.EVENT_SN, TO_CHAR(A.EVENT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EVENT_DT, A.EVENT_BEGIN_TIME, A.EVENT_END_TIME, A.EVENT_NM, A.PLACE, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.DELETE_AT, A.REF_RESVE_SN FROM TN_EVENT_SCHDUL A WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND EVENT_SN = #eventSn#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(EVENT_SN),0) + 1 AS EVENT_SN FROM TN_EVENT_SCHDUL
/* HkCultureResveDAO.insertSchdul */ INSERT INTO TN_EVENT_SCHDUL ( EVENT_SN, EVENT_DT, EVENT_BEGIN_TIME, EVENT_END_TIME, EVENT_NM, PLACE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DELETE_AT, REF_RESVE_SN ) VALUES ( #eventSn#, TO_DATE(#eventDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #eventBeginTime#, #eventEndTime#, #eventNm#, #place#, SYSDATE, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE, #lastUpdusrId#, 'N', #refResveSn# )
sqlMap.select: /* HkCultureResveDAO.schdulChkCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_EVENT_SCHDUL A WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND REF_RESVE_SN = #refResveSn#
sqlMap.update: /* HkCultureResveDAO.updateSchdul */ UPDATE TN_EVENT_SCHDUL SET EVENT_DT = TO_DATE(#eventDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD'), EVENT_BEGIN_TIME = #eventBeginTime#, EVENT_END_TIME = #eventEndTime#, EVENT_NM = #eventNm#, PLACE = #place#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE EVENT_SN = #eventSn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.deleteSchdul */ UPDATE TN_EVENT_SCHDUL SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE EVENT_SN = #eventSn#
/* HkCultureResveDAO.chgResveSn */ UPDATE TN_CULT_FCLTY_RESVE SET USE_AT = #useAt# WHERE RESVE_SN = #resveSn#
